"Exterminate All Targets!": "Defeat all enemies!"
"Defeat all enemies!"

"Nyau is retreating... Wait!
Its retreat is causing some
sort of spacial distortion!
Please, be careful!"

"Enemies have emerged.
Please, I know we're asking you
all to fight another battle, but
we need you to intercept them."

"One of the enemies has been
defeated. There's one remaining."

"Much appreciated. You have our
thanks for dealing with this so well."
